name: DeBounce

tweets.text: We have launched the integration with @ActiveCampaign. Easily transfer your lists and start validating. More information: https://debounce.io/integrations/activecampaign/ …

#changelog You Can Abort a Validation.

You Asked, So We Built It. Sometimes you need to abort the validation because you are in a hurry to run a campaign.
http://headwayapp.co/debounce-updates/you-can-abort-a-validation-145322 …

#changelog Free Pre-Start Analysis.

Now, paid users can perform a quick and free analysis to get an estimation of a list's bounce rate prior to starting the list for full validation.

http://headwayapp.co/debounce-updates/free-pre-start-analysis-145320 …

#changelog We're starting a changelog.

Big news today, we're starting a public changelog so you're always
up to date with all the updates, improvements and fixes that are
made in Debounce.
http://headwayapp.co/debounce-updates/we're-starting-a-changelog-145316 …
Wow! Integrations seem to be countless! Integration with @HubSpot is here: https://debounce.io/integrations/hubspot/ …

Direct integration with @ConvertKit

We have just launched an integration with @lemlist
More information: https://debounce.io/integrations/lemlist/ …

Yahoo has started disabling many old and useless email accounts from a couple of months ago. You need to read this article to save your sending reputation: https://debounce.io/blog/articles/yahoo-emails-bouncing-problem/ …
